resources:
MineSweeper
Welcome to MineSeeker! By Kabir and Sarbjot Skip Help The objective of this game is to find the number of mines. Each box 
 in the table will consist of either a mine, or a number that tells the user 
 how many mines are in ts column and row. 
 
 To win, clear out all of the mines Back About the Authors2 Kabir and Sarbjot are third year students studying CS at SFU. More info here http://opencoursehub.cs.sfu.ca/jackt/grav-cms/cmpt276/home Main Menu Play Game Options Help Settings Board Size Number of Balloons Clear Play Time Welcome to Balloon Finder All stores have sold out of balloons! Your objective is to 
 find the missing ballons. Click on a button in the table 
 to see a balloon or a number that tells you the number of 
 balloons in the row and column Balloon Button Clicked Save Settings 4x6 5x10 6x15
